contest-event.event-date:
May 17, 1958 D Senior Cup
British Open Spring Festival (Senior Cup) 20 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival senior-cup
This section not held from 1983 to 2000.
Venus and Adonis
Belle Vue (Exhibition Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK British Bandsman 24/05/1958 gives the result as follows :- 1st Mossley, 184, 2nd Arley 180, 3rd Lockwood 176, 4th Knottingley 173.
This is also given on the list of prizewinners Belle Vue used to print every year for the Open held in Kings Hall (price in 1974 -10p).
April 26, 2011, 8:35 p.m. April 16, 2015, 9:37 p.m.
